resources.string: Manage all your trusted personal,home and professional service providers in one place and Connect with your closest friends and family to Discover new providers. Its easy And free!
Easily add local service providers, friends and family with the click of few buttons and start simplifying your life.
Leverage the power of your network to share,find and engage with trusted helpers. Experience the simplicity of virtual work of mouth.
Commuicate seemlessly from one platform and pay your service providers with the click button. No more worries about remembering to write a check or keep cash on hand!
